name: file
description: File operations: read, write, and list directory contents

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a file at the specified path

path.description: The path to the file to read (relative or absolute)

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write content to a file at the specified path

path.description: The path to the file to write

content.description: The content to write to the file

append.description: If true, append to the file instead of overwriting

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List the contents of a directory

path.description: The path to the directory (default: current directory)
